title: 2.1 Master Challenge 3
question: Write a code to create a class BankAccount with two attributes: owner and balance. Write two methods called  deposit() and  withdraw() that let the user deposit and withdraw money from the account. Write a check_balance() method that displays the current balance.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
